summary: Allows you to change the weather.
descriptionHtml:
Did you want control of the weather for all of Solstheim. Well now you can. You can set it to be clear, cloudy, foggy, overcast, ashstorm, light snow, heavy snow and you can reset to default. You may also choose what region type you want (Example: You can have the clear sky that is seen when your along the northwestern coast anywhere in Solstheim). You may also choose to have Northern Lights at night or not to have Northern Lights at night. It will add an item to the players inventory when you start the game and to change the weather just equip the item. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1010?]here[/url]. Also look at myÂ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75592/?]Skyrim Weather Control[/url].

Requirements
Skyrim
Dragonborn

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin, and bsa into your data folder.
author: LegoManIAm94
